entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:03 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 3:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow changing to rain this evening then to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the river. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
